page.title: 12Roads
page.content: Hampshire County Council is the Highway Authority. All the roads in Sherborne St. John are local roads except the A340 Basingstoke to Tadley road which is a County Primary road. The regular bus service from Basingstoke to Tadley travels on this road.There is a route reserved on the local Plan for a by-pass which will take the A340 west of Sherborne st. John to join the Basingstoke Ring Road system. The Ring Road was built at the time that Basingstoke expanded. There is a space for a dual carriageway thoughout its length, although to date, single carriageway exists in places. Estate roads are planned to run mainly on the outskirts of the housing into garage areas, leaving safe pedestrian walkways.
